pages.text:
Downtown Orlando | Downtown Apopka
+1 (407) 237-0657
About Us
Our mission is to serve people who crave unique flavors, experiences, and ideas while creating opportunities for chefs to showcase their creativity. We hope to foster a spirit of exploration by connecting people through food.
Our Story
We know from experience that each moment determines a lasting impression; this is precisely the level of detail we bring to every aspect of our business. Beyond our amazing food and stellar service, we embody a comfortable and refreshing atmosphere inviting to all.
Creative & Exciting Cuisine
Whether you’re looking for a bite to eat or a dining experience with friends, our tapas style menu will deliver just that with overflowing amounts of flavor. We pride ourselves on carefully selecting mouthwatering flavor combinations to ensure no tastebud leaves dissatisfied. From the moment you arrive to the moment you depart, our goal is nothing short of dining excellence.
Make a reservation

Downtown Orlando | Downtown Apopka
+1 (407) 237-0657
Private Events / Catering
We do everything from small groups to full buyouts, curated in-house experiences, catering and custom cakes made to order for your special occasion!
Our team is here to listen to all your needs and make your dreams come true. Your wish is our command!
For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch soon. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out at thriveevents@thrivinghospitalityent.com
CONTACT US NOW TO START PLANNING YOUR EVENT OR CATERING ORDER TODAY!
